Public Interface IRandomAccessIterator(Of TValue) Implements IBidirectionalIterator(Of TValue)
generic <typename TValue> public interface class IRandomAccessIterator : Microsoft::VisualC::StlClr::Generic::IBidirectionalIterator<TValue>

typeparam.name: TValue
typeparam.span: 受控序列中的元素的类型。

span.span: The type of an element in the controlled sequence.

summary.span: 定义随机访问迭代器的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface for a random access iterator.

summary.span: 随机访问迭代器支持以下操作：通过调用 operator++ 向前移动一个位置、通过调用 operator-- 向后移动一个位置、通过使用 operator[] 访问元素以及通过使用指针算法访问元素。

span.span: Random access iterators support the following operations: moving forward one position by calling operator++, moving backward one position by calling operator--, accessing an element by using operator[], and accessing an element by using pointer arithmetic.

summary.span: 确定当前迭代器指向的元素与给定迭代器指向的元素之间的距离。

span.span: Determines the distance between the element that the current iterator is pointing to and the element that the given iterator is pointing to.

returns.span: 当前迭代器指向的元素与 指向的元素之间的距离，以元素数为单位。

span.span: The distance, in number of elements, between the element that the current iterator is pointing to and the element that is pointing to.

returns.span: 如果 指向的元素位于当前迭代器指向的元素之前，则此数字为负数。

span.span: This number is negative if points to an element that is before the element that the current iterator points to.
